meta.title: Find an agent – MyHome24App
meta.description: Find the perfect real-estate agent for your needs. Compare reviews, contact agencies directly and start your property search with professional support.

hero.title: Connect with the right expert for your home
hero.subtitle: Compare profiles, regions and ratings and send your request to verified real-estate professionals in just a few clicks.

intro: On MyHome24App we connect you with experienced agents who truly know your region and local market.

items.title: Local expertise
items.text: Agents who really know your city, neighbourhood and the current market prices.

items.title: Transparent reviews
items.text: See feedback from other clients and quickly find the best match for your situation.

items.title: Direct contact
items.text: Send your enquiry directly via MyHome24App and clarify all details with the agent team.

items.title: Create your search profile
items.text: Briefly describe whether you want to sell, rent or buy and in which region.

items.title: Compare agents
items.text: Filter by specialisation, region and ratings to get the best matches.

items.title: Get in touch
items.text: Send a request directly through the platform – the agent will contact you afterwards.

tip.title: Tip for a successful collaboration
tip.text: The more precisely you describe your situation and budget, the better the agent can assess whether they are a good fit for your project.
tip.disclaimer: MyHome24App currently only connects you with agents and does not provide its own legal or tax advice.
